pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reverse Geocoding with the Photon Geocoder for OpenStreetMap, Google Maps, and Bing // Function revgeo() allows you to use the Photon geocoder for OpenStreetMap http://photon.komoot.de, Google Maps http://maps.google.com, and Bing https://www.bingmapsportal.com to reverse geocode coordinate pairs with minimal hassle.
